definition[0]: to feel angry or upset with someone because they have something that you think they do not deserve
example[0]: We shouldn’t begrudge her this success.
definition[1]: to feel annoyed or unhappy that you have to pay something, give someone something etc
example[1]: The farmer’s wife never begrudged him a meal at the end of the day.
example[2]: I begrudge spending so much money on train fares.
